title: Was Sargento Brand Cheese Recalled in August or September 2017?
subtitle: Sargento is the latest victim of a "zombie recall" form of fake news, when an outdated consumer warning circulates as new long after the problem is resolved.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: Sargento cheese was recalled on 9 May 2017 (or in August/September 2017), because it might kill your whole family.
